entry.title: Building A Machine Learning Validation Framework

link.title: Building A Machine Learning Validation Framework

entry.summary: Before training a machine learning (ML) model, the dataset is divided into training, validation, and testing sets. This process of dividing the dataset is also known as building a validation framework.
